message.body: Since steak em up just messaged you, im done....save me from the drama...talk later
I responded to him in a personal message
And what was said, i hope you handled the situation respectfully?
Oh course. I was very professional. He is going to handle the situation.
Alright...hopefully he doesnt go to harsh on anyone...

No I told him im not looking to have the kid lose his job but that the kid needs to be respectful to customers and stop playing around. But the owner said the kid is a cook and shouldn't even he answering the phones in the first place
Good then. All they have to do is a little readjustment.
Ok then, im done for tonight, good night
